Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Class Item

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ItemInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
MartianItem, PortableItem, WeaponItem
public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements ItemInterface, Printable, Capable
Abstract base class representing a physical object in the game world.

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, boolean portable)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this Item
      displayChar - the character to use to represent this item if it is on the ground
      portable - true if and only if the Item can be picked up

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      Inform a carried Item of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the Item is being carried.
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying this Item.
      actor - The actor carrying this Item.

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location currentLocation)
      Inform an Item on the ground of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the item rests upon the ground.
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the ground on which we lie.

    • getDisplayChar

      public char getDisplayChar()
      Specified by:
      getDisplayChar in interface Printable

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • getPickUpAction

      public PickUpItemAction getPickUpAction()
      Create and return an action to pick this Item up. If this Item is not portable, returns null.
      Returns:
      a new PickUpItemAction if this Item is portable, null otherwise.

    • getDropAction

      public DropItemAction getDropAction()
      Create and return an action to drop this Item. If this Item is not portable, returns null.
      Returns:
      a new DropItemAction if this Item is portable, null otherwise.

    • getAllowableActions

      public java.util.List<Action> getAllowableActions()
      Getter. Returns an unmodifiable copy of the actions list so that calling methods won't be able to change what this Item can do without the Item checking.
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Actions

    • asWeapon

      public Weapon asWeapon()
      Casts this Item to a Weapon if possible.
      Returns:
      a reference to the current Item as type Weapon, or null if this Item isn't a Weapon

    • hasCapability

      public boolean hasCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
      Does this Item have the given Capability?
      Specified by:
      hasCapability in interface Capable
      Returns:
      true if and only if is Item has the given Capability

    • addCapability

      public void addCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
      Add a Capability to this Item.
      Specified by:
      addCapability in interface Capable
      Parameters:
      capability - the Capability to add

    • removeCapability

      public void removeCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
      Remove a Capability from this Item.
      Specified by:
      removeCapability in interface Capable
      Parameters:
      capability - the Capability to remove
